text:
gement of poor progress in the active phase
o Use the rule of 4Ps in the assessment (Patient, Powers, Passage, Passenger- see block below).
o Ensure adequate maternal hydration:
 Give a bolus of Sodium Chloride 0,9% (200-300 mL intravenously) and continue with an IV
i
nfusion of Sodium Chloride 0,9% to run at 120 mL/hour.
 She can also take oral fluids
o Ensure that the bladder is empty: catheterise if necessary.
o I f there is evidence of CPD in a multipara (increasing grade of sagittal mould
